Package com.quantcomponents.chart

Interface Summary
IAxis<T> Chart axis
IChartMetrics<A,O> The metrics for a chart at a specific point in time.
ICurrentValueProvider<T> Chart objects that can provide a 'current value' to be highlighted
IDataRange<A,O> Range for the X and Y coordinates of a series to be displayed on a chart
IDrawable<A,O> Elementary object which is drawable on a chart
IMark<T> A single mark to be displayed along an axis
IMarkScale<T> Scale of the marks to be displayed on an axis
IMarkScaleSelector<T> Calculates the scale of the marks (e.g.
 

Class Summary
ArrayScaleSelector<T> Implementation of IMarkScaleSelector
BaseAxis<T extends Comparable<T>> Base implementation class for IAxis
Chart<A,O> Base class for charts.
DataRange<A,O> Container for the X and Y ranges of a data-series
HorizontalLabelContainer<T> Container of axis labels.
HorizontalLabelContainer.LabelInfo<T> All the information needed to render the label on a chart
